dict.acceptation: 损失；输掉；走慢；降低价值；

sent.orig: And if ever lose my hands, lose my plough, lose my land.
sent.trans: 而如果有朝一日我失去双手，失去我犁地失去我的土地。

sent.orig: For instance, cave fish lose their eyes, while parasites like tapeworms lose their guts.
sent.trans: 举例来说，洞穴鱼失去了眼睛，而像绦虫一样的寄生虫则失去内脏。

sent.orig: Moreover, "competition between two tigers a lose-lose. "
sent.trans: 何况“二虎相争，两败俱伤”。

sent.orig: We lose courage, then we will lose everything.
sent.trans: 如果我们失去勇气，那我们就失去了一切。

sent.orig: When falling in love, some lose their head, others lose their heart.
sent.trans: 在陷入情网的时候，有些人丢了头脑，另一些人丢了心。
